snippet.title: The Apple of Our Eye 😍🍎 | Pokémon Café ReMix
snippet.description:
Order up, Trainers! We’re cooking up lots of fun with our New Menu Item Release Celebration for the Appletun Frutilicious Jelly Soda! 🍹

🍎 Have Flapple or Appletun join your staff when you complete the event, starting Friday February 28 through Friday, March 14

🍃🔥💧 Paldea starter Pokémon will gradually become available in their sweets outfit packs, beginning with Sprigatito on February 28

⚡ Log in now to have Pikachu in its sweets outfit join your staff

🤎 Log in for three days, Eevee in its sweets outfit will join your staff

Learn more: https://pkmn.news/PokemonCafeReMix 🍰

Official site: https://www.pokemon.com
Shop: http://www.pokemoncenter.com
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/Pokemon
Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/Pokemon
Instagram: http://www.instagram.com/pokemon
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@pokemonofficial
